casebody.data:
HOLLY MANUF’G CO., Appellant, v. VENNER, Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by the Holly Manufacturing Company against Clarence H. Venner.

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and FOLLETT and PARKER, JJ.

D. McClure, for appellant. B. Winthrop, for respondent.

No opinion. Order modified by requiring defendant, as a condition of granting stay, to give bond for $2,500, and, as modified, affirmed, without costs. See 26. N. Y. Supp. 581.
